name: (Paper 3) Cambridge Key English Test (KET3) - Speaking Course
intro: (Level A1) Improve your speaking skills for the Cambridge KET exam with this focused course. Practice interactive speaking exercises, personal responses, and building fluency in conversational contexts. This course prepares you to excel in the KET Speaking paper by emphasizing key communication strategies and confidence-building techniques.
lessonNames: The examiner will ask you and your partner some questions. These questions will be about your daily life, past experience and future plans. For example, you may have to speak about your school, job, hobbies or home town.
